Properties.Name: Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'

Properties.Name: Explosive Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of explosive'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0 || PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Properties.Name: TNT Equivalent
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'TNT eq of explosive mass'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0 || PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Properties.Name: Frag Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of individual fragments'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

Properties.Name: Frag Count
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Number of individual fragments'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

Properties.Name: Frag Cone Angle
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Cone angle, larger is more efficent per fragment'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

Properties.Name: Mass0
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'
Properties.PropertyFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0, PropertyValue('Explosive Mass') + PropertyValue('Frag Mass') * PropertyValue('Frag Count'), 0)

Properties.Name: ExplDataBlob
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)
Properties.PropertyFormula: AtbConstrArgs(PropertyValue('Trigger Type'), PropertyValue('Mass0'), PropertyValue('TNT Equivalent'), PropertyValue('Frag Mass'), PropertyValue('Frag Count'), PropertyValue('Frag Cone Angle'))

Properties.Name: Liner Radius
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Properties.Name: Liner Cone Height
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Properties.Name: Liner Thickness
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Properties.Name: LinerDensity
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Density of copper'

Properties.Name: LinerVolume
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'volume of the cone liner'
Properties.PropertyFormula: PropertyValue('Liner Thickness') * 3.14159265359 * PropertyValue('Liner Radius') * PropertyValue('Liner Radius') + Sqrt( Pow(PropertyValue('Liner Cone Height'),2) + Pow(PropertyValue('Liner Radius'),2) )

Properties.Name: Mass1
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'
Properties.PropertyFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, PropertyValue('Explosive Mass') + PropertyValue('LinerVolume') * 1000 / PropertyValue('LinerDensity') , 0)

Properties.Name: ShapeDataBlob
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)
Properties.PropertyFormula: AtbConstrArgs(PropertyValue('Trigger Type'), PropertyValue('Mass1'), PropertyValue('TNT Equivalent'), PropertyValue('Liner Radius'), PropertyValue('Liner Cone Height'))

Properties.Name: Submunition Type
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Pre-Designed missile to use as a submunition'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)

Properties.Name: Submunition Count
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Number of submunitions in this payload'
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)

Properties.Name: SubMunitionWeight
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How the hell am I going to get this'

Properties.Name: Mass2
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'

Properties.Name: SubmDataBlob
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)
Properties.PropertyFormula: AtbConstrArgs(PropertyValue('Trigger Type'), PropertyValue('Mass2'), PropertyValue('Submunition Type'), PropertyValue('Submunition Count'))

Properties.Name: Engine Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of the engine'

Properties.Name: Exhaust Velocity
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Specific Impulse in m/s, can be increased by research (todo)'

Properties.Name: Fuel Consumption
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Fuel Consumption per second'

Properties.Name: Thrust
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'The maximum thrust output of this engine in N'

Properties.Name: Antenna Size
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Gives an effective area of:  '

Properties.Name: Effective Size
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)

Properties.Name: Ideal Detection Wavelength
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'The wavelength this sensor is most efficient at detecting'

Properties.Name: Detection Bandwidth
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How far from the ideal wavelength will this still detect a signal'

Properties.Name: Efficiency
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)

Properties.Name: Sensitivity at Ideal Wavelength
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Smallest signal this can detect at the ideal wavelength, lower is better.

Properties.Name: Sensitivity at Worst Wavelength
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Smallest signal this can detect at the worst wavelength, lower is better.'

Properties.Name: Resolution
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much detail it can get from a detection. affects likelyhood of component detection etc. '

Properties.Name: Scan Time
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'how long it takes to complete a full scan'

Properties.Name: Mass
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass Calculation'

Properties.Name: DatablobArguments
Properties.DescriptionFormula: '(int GuidanceTypeEnumValue, int TriggerType)'

Properties.Name: SensorDatablobArguments
Properties.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 2 || PropertyValue('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
Properties.DescriptionFormula: '(double peakWaveLength, double bandwidth, double bestSensitivity, double worstSensitivity, double resolution, double scanTime)'
Properties.PropertyFormula: AtbConstrArgs(PropertyValue('Ideal Detection Wavelength'), PropertyValue('Detection Bandwidth'), PropertyValue('Sensitivity at Ideal Wavelength'), PropertyValue('Sensitivity at Worst Wavelength'), PropertyValue('Resolution'), PropertyValue('Scan Time'))

Properties.Name: Size Efficiency
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'The amount of tonnage taken up by racking, office space etc.'

Properties.Name: Cargo Transfer Rate
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much cargo can be transfered per hour in kg.'

Properties.Name: Transfer Range
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'How much Dv can be expended to transfer cargo'

Properties.Name: Total Cargo Stored
Properties.DescriptionFormula: 'The amount of cargo this can store.'
Properties.PropertyFormula: PropertyValue('Rack Size') - PropertyValue('Size Efficiency') - PropertyValue('Cargo Transfer Rate')
